Title: We are heartbroken to report that Bilha Yinon (76), who has been missing si...
Description: We are heartbroken to report that Bilha Yinon (76), who has been missing since October 7th, has now been confirmed dead by the IDF. She and her husband, Yakov, were murdered in Moshav Netiv Ha?asara during the October 7th Hamas terrorist massacre, but her remains could only be identified now. Bilha was the last missing person from the massacre. May their memories forever be a blessing. ?
